nodes.text: Turlin/Benthic Extraction, also known simply as Turlin/Benthic or T/B, was a mining consortium in the galaxy. They were notably able to gain limited mining concessions on Legacy worlds such as Wadi Raffa. There, they worked extracting undersea ores such as doonium, meleenium, dolovite and kammris. Its operations on Wadi Raffa were targeted by the Galactic Empire, being framed for receiving illegally-trafficked Separatist weaponry as justification for having their environmentally-conscious operations hijacked by the Empire.
